title: Catalog overview
description: Summarize the uploaded dataset using the analytics _catalog metadata table.
instructions: Use SQL to read from the "_catalog" table ordered by rows in descending order. Respect the optional "limit" argument (default 5). Produce a Markdown bullet list for each table including the table name, total row count with thousands separators, and the first three columns recorded in the catalog. Note when a table contains additional columns beyond those listed.

limit.description: Maximum number of tables to include in the overview.
